about_the_game:
Single-Server MMO Universe

Explore, mine, build, research, and fight in space - alone, with friends, or with a corporation.
Experience the ultimate MMO on our single-server worldwide architecture. Say goodbye to queue times, deserted servers, or server merging. All your friends are on the same server, so you can easily team up and conquer the vastness of Subspace.

PvE - Co-op

Immerse yourself in a cooperative PvE universe, whether playing solo or with others. Enjoy full loot rewards from combat and mining - your rewards remain the same even when other players join.

Cross-Play

After Early Access and with the worldwide launch, cross-play for seamless gaming across platforms and shared purchases are planned.

Mine Asteroids for Resources

Mine valuable resources from asteroids to build ships and equipment, research new technologies, or construct a base.

Evolving Story

Venture deeper into space to uncover the mysteries of the alien invaders.
Instead of being the 1000th player to kill 5 rats or deliver bread to the baker, you are working with all players to progress through the storyline and find the source of the invasion. Your actions and rewards will become part of your legacy.

Defeat Invader

Engage enemies or participate in epic battles.
Customize your ship as a powerful tank or a high-damage dealer. Utilize sheer force or clever tactics to secure victory and carve your legend in Subspace, while saving Earth from certain destruction.

United Path

Players must join forces to solve weekly events together. The path ahead is shaped by the actions of everyone.
Events drive the story of Subspace Discovery, bringing players together to work towards a common goal. Progress towards uncovering the mysteries of the invasion, sharing in success or failure.

Don’t wait any longer, join the adventure now!

name: Subspace Discovery

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Graphics: OpenGL® Compatible
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenGL® Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Graphics: OpenGL® Compatible
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenGL® Compatible

short_description: Fly through Subspace, build your own ship, and engage in epic battles. Mine asteroids and research new technologies. Uncover the origins of the alien homeworld by solving weekly events in this Co-op PvE MMO.
supported_languages:
English*, German*, French, Japanese, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
